q: on personnel decisions. Jim Mora has shown he is not afraid to draw a line in the sand when necessary. The Eagles' Michael Vick was Jim Mora 's starting quarterback in Atlanta. And although Michael Vick and Jim Mora were on the same page 80 percent of the time, according to Ike Reese , the relationship soured in 2006 after the quarterback gave Falcons fans a middle-finger salute at a home game. "There were some rough patches down the stretch," Ike Reese said. "

more media consolidation. Sen. Bernie Sanders ( I., Vt.) decried the deal, as did Rep. Maxine Waters ( D., Calif.). DirecTV, in a filing with the FCC on Jan. 5, said the unprecedented array of assets would give Comcast new opportunities to gain unfair leverage over rivals to the detriment of consumers, later noting that "Comcast has a history of anticompetitive conduct, and the proposed transaction will give it the ability to enhance and extend that conduct."
